extendedInfo.description: ZTE handset doctor is developed for ZTE smart phone users of Android operating system. You can check âCommon questions and answersâ directly through the apps user interface which is linked to the ZTE FAQ server. Multiple functions are available: Top 10 check, search by item, classifying ,creating favorites and feedback. The application supports Chinese, English, Portuguese (Brazil), French, Turkey and Spanish language, and applies to all ZTE smart phones of Android 2.3 and above operating system.How to install:Download from Google market and press install. It might be necessary to tick the unknown source field in the security and privacy settings in your handset.
